cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 85 miles ESE of Progreso, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest today, then turning north-northeast across the Gulf toward the southeast Louisiana–Mississippi coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southeast Louisiana (near Morgan City–New Orleans area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch west of Morgan City to Intracoastal City, LA
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Morgan City, LA to MS/AL border; Tropical Storm Warning MS/AL border to Okaloosa/Walton County Line, FL
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from southeast Louisiana through Alabama and the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty easterly winds possible; tropical-storm-force likelihood very low (<5%).
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor water-level rises under 2 ft possible along the upper Texas coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rain bands may drop 1–2 inches Wednesday night into Thursday.
weather_observation.other_hazards: None expected to significantly impact port operations.
